TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Matrix3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: Represents a 4 x 4 matrix used for transformations in 3-D space.

span.span: Represents a 4 x 4 matrix used for transformations in 3-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有下列資料列向量語法： has the following row-vector syntax: ||||| |-|-|-|-| ||||| ||||| ||||| ||||| 請注意，第四個資料行也是可存取的因為矩陣可讓開發人員代表仿射與非仿射轉換。Note that because the fourth column is also accessible, the matrix allows developers to represent affine as well as non-affine transforms. 矩陣可以附加或前面加上其他矩陣。Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices. 將矩陣的附加到矩陣 B 代表轉換依 B 和 a:Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: Appends a specified matrix to the current matrix.

span.span: Appends a specified matrix to the current matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩陣可以附加或前面加上其他矩陣。Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices. 將矩陣的附加到矩陣 B 代表轉換依 B 和 a:Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ``` A(B(...)) ``` 之前 A 到 B 代表轉換由 A 和 b:Prepending A to B denotes a transformation by A and then by B: ``` B(A(...)) ``` 若要轉換點 P 由 A 和 B，加上 B a:To transform point P by A and then by B, append B to A: ``` C = A.Append(B); P' = C.Transform(P); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Identity As Matrix3D
public: static property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D Identity { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D get(); };

summary.span: Changes a structure into an identity .

span.span: Changes a structure into an identity .

value.span: Matrix3D 身分識別。

span.span: The identity Matrix3D.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在身分識別矩陣，所有係數都是 [1，1] 以外的 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 的係數，設為 1。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 當它套用至端點，是不變，是特殊身分識別矩陣。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 身分識別矩陣用於修改頂點值，以建立旋轉、 翻譯以及任何可以表示的 4x4 矩陣的轉換的矩陣做為起點。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.

span.span: Inverts this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否可反轉 Matrix3D 結構，請閱讀其屬性。To determine whether a Matrix3D structure is invertible, read its property.

exception.span: Throws InvalidOperationException if the matrix is not invertible.

span.span: Throws InvalidOperationException if the matrix is not invertible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在身分識別矩陣，所有係數都是 [1，1] 以外的 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 的係數，設為 1。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 當它套用至端點，是不變，是特殊身分識別矩陣。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 身分識別矩陣用於修改頂點值，以建立旋轉、 翻譯以及任何可以表示的 4x4 矩陣的轉換的矩陣做為起點。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.

summary.span: Compares two instances for exact equality.

span.span: Compares two instances for exact equality.

returns.span: that indicates whether the two matrix instances are equal.

span.span: that indicates whether the two matrix instances are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，雙精度浮點數值可以取得錯誤時，在其上作業，以便在邏輯上相等的兩個值之間進行精確比較可能會失敗。Note that double values can acquire error when operated upon, so that an exact comparison between two values that are logically equal may fail. 此外，使用此等號比較運算子，Double.NaN 不是自己本身。Furthermore, using this equality operator, Double.NaN is not equal to itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetIdentity() cil managed

summary.span: Changes this structure into an identity matrix.

span.span: Changes this structure into an identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在身分識別矩陣，所有係數都是 [1，1] 以外的 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 的係數，設為 1。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 當它套用至端點，是不變，是特殊身分識別矩陣。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 身分識別矩陣用於修改頂點值，以建立旋轉、 翻譯以及任何可以表示的 4x4 矩陣的轉換的矩陣做為起點。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.
